Title: Create an api to add/update a notebook
Description:
As a user I want to be able to create a notebook with a title
So that I can add notes

As a user I want to be able to update the notebook title
So that I can rename my notebook whenever I like

Title: Create an api to get all notebooks
Description:
As a user I want to get all my notebooks
So that I can see all my notebooks

Title: Create an api to add and edit a note
Description:
As a user I want to add a note
So that I can save a note online

As a user I want to edit a note
So that I can update it when I need to

Title: Create an api to get a notebook
Description:
As a user I want to get a single notebook
So that I can see its contents

Title: Create an api to add users
Description:
I want to be able to add users
so that multiple users can add notes

A user should have a username and password

Title: Create an api to get a user
Description: As a user I want to get my user details

Title: Return an error message when returning a http 4xx error
Description:
When there is a HTTP 4xx error, no error message is returned.
As a user, I want to see an error message when there is a HTTP 4xx error
so that I know what I need to do to make a proper api call

Title: Create an api to delete a note
Description:
As a user I want to delete a single note
So that I can get rid of my old notes

Title: Create an api to get a note
Description:
As a user I want to get a single note
So that I can fetch a note and read its contents

Title: Create an api to add a note to a notebook
Description:
As a user I want to add a note to a notebook
So that I can save related notes to a notebook

Title: Get notebook by id should return a 404 when the notebook cannot be found
Description:
Current it returns an HTTP 200 with an empty body.
It should return a 404 and an error message indicating the notebook cannot be found.

Title: Find a notebook by title
Description:
As a user I want to find a notebook by title
So that I can search for a notebook without having to remember or know its id.

Title: Find a note by its contents
Description:
As a user I want to find a note by its contents
So that I can fetch a note without having to remember or know its id

Title: Create an api to delete a notebook and associated notes
Description:
As a user I want to delete a notebook
So that the notebooks and notes inside no longer exist

Title: Tie the notebooks to users
Description:
Currently, notes and notebooks are not tied to users.

A user should only be able to add a notebook to a user account.
A user should only be able to add a note to a notebook under a user account.

Title: Allow the user to add an attachment to a note
Description:
As a user I want to add images to my notes
So that I can link related images, pdfs, word docs, etc to my note

(A smaller task might be to support only images instead of arbitrary files)

Title: Authenticate user before updating note or notebook
Description:
Right now, anyone can update any note.
As a user I should only be able to update my notebooks/notes
Otherwise that would be a security problem.

(A smaller task might be to do this for one or two endpoints. The rest of the endpoints will probably require the same work)
